desc: Please do not apply you do not agree with the payment terms. It is a waste of your time and mine.Paying $2000 for a complete IOS app to be completed in 75 days.No upfront payments, not negotiable. I do not believe in paying when there is no work to be paid for. And since we are doing all of this online, there is no trust as to speak of. Money will be uploaded to [url removed, login to view] anyway so if you complete a project, then you get paid. It is that simple.Payment is only released when the product is completed. This is a milestone release system which means pay is only released upon completed work.No hard coding. No php. Version update every two weeks.I have hired more than ten freelancers in my time and to be honest, most of them did not do a very good job. At the end, it was either an unhappy client or an unhappy freelancer. Some of those jobs even resulted in disputes. Please DO NOT let that be us.ONLY APPLY IF YOU ARE 100% SURE YOU CAN COMPLETE THIS JOB WITHIN THE DEADLINE.If lateness in completing deadline, then there will be a deduction of $20 per day it is late.Skills needed:1) IOS frontend and backend2) Time management3) Deadline management4) Payment integration/ real chat integration5) Attention to detail6) Invision, Zeplin and Sketch software/familiarity.Please submit your proposal WITH your answers to the following questions:1) How many developers are taking on this job? Are you a solo freelancer or is this a team effort?2) How much time can you (and your team if you have one) commit to this job per week?3) What are your hours of work?4) Can you complete an app similar to AIRBNB for under 75 days?5) How good are you with attention to detail in design?
title: $2000 IOS APP (NO UPFRONT)

desc: The fishing game would be a tablet based game that would be used at tradeshows to engage visitors to the booth and collect information about them. Upon visiting the booth, the tablets will be mounted to the table and will allow users to play.1. In order to play, a user is forced to enter their name and email and/or phone number in the event they win a prize, this will also include a checkbox that states we can or cannot add them to our mailing list2. Once they have entered the required information, a screen will pop up with instructions on how to play the game, the user is responsible for ‘catching a fish’ and the largest fish caught from the event will be the winner of the prize for that event.3. Once they click ‘Okay’ it will show them the pond, ( [url removed, login to view] ) where they will use their finger to catch a fish.4. In order to catch a fish, the user touches the fish and must follow it around the screen until the ‘catch meter’ fills up to full. The larger the fish, the harder it will be to catch, but the definitely should never exceed ‘medium’. As they follow the fish and the catch meter fills up, the tablet could vibrate a little showing the ‘fight’ with the fish.5. Once the user has followed the fish with their finger long enough that the catch meter is full, it will present a screen showing the type and weight of the fish they have caught, this information will be randomized based on the fish swimming, the larger the fish, the harder it should be to catch them. Once the user has had a chance to review this screen, they can ‘try again’ or ‘frame my catch’ which would add their catch to the leader board for that event.6. The information, including email, name, phone number, fish size, weight, and date time should be uploaded to a web based MySQL database where the data can be used by our staff for other promotional purposes and display using another application developed externally.Other Features:- admin menu where we can reset the game after each event- the ability to change fish names, and sizes for each fish type- the ability to change the wording in the messages appearing in the app- graphic work can be supplied by our team of designers
title: Custom APP - Game / Promotional Game

desc: this idea so this is what i think, please share your expertise and knowledge.Log in with social media.Logo at Top (where it says: find your ebook)underneath that it should state: The only app which rewards you with crypto currency, gold and silver.read more should link to how the app works (I can provide this later)Profit: is the institial ads playing every 120 seconds for a maximum of 10 minutes then break for 20 minutes and we have to stop at a certain level within a 24 hour period say for example no more than 20 institials in one hour, could we have a backend admin to log somehow how many they have watched?Living: we need an add with maximum revenue for this one (your input would be appreciated) ads which play once a day and the user gets rewarded with a fraction of gold dust, everyday they get rewarded until they have enough dust to change for a 1 gram gold bar.Crypto: Should point to our site where the user can learn about crypto and it should contain native ad or banner, the user will get 2 dogecoin sent to their crypto wallet after a certain threshold, again need to be able to log the users actions to determine revenue, once a day only or if we can work out revenue acrued for the ads we place.Invest: Should point to our site where users can invest in gold and silver and are offered opportunities to make some money with little or no investment.Blog: Should point to our site which gives a daily or wekly blog of whats happening and updatesRefer: Allows users to refer their family and friends and get rewards for their participation.Not sure what the bell and other icons are at the bottom but anything else you think would push the app would be appreciated, look forward to hearing from you.
title: Hire an App Developer

desc: ENGLISH:The following needs to be developed:A single Home page (PHP, Ruby, Bootstrap) with access to a login dashboard that has an SSL encryption. On this Dashboard ONLY the administrator is authorised toprovide access to multiple users via logins (individual registration not allowed)Such a user (administrator?) can setup multiple non-public profiles (a kind of a file) with the following data:1. Profile pictures2. Alias Names3. Domicile4. Date of birth5. Place of birth6. Hair color7. Eye color8. Height9. Weight10. Body stature11. Skin color12. Sex13. Nationality14. Profession15. Tatoos and other physical characteristics16. Text field. 2500 charactersAfter the user has sucessfully setup a profile, he or she can send an email or a push notification to the APP user. (All across the state or in a certain region of the state)If needed, the profile can be shared on Twitter, Facebook and other such platforms.APP:An App needs to be developed together with such a dashboard. (with an API intgeration)In this App normal users should be able to register (E-Mail-, Facebook-, Google-, Twitter-Login).Login details should include only Name and Email address. The confirmation of receipt would be sent through a push notification.After receipt of the push notification or the email, the user should be able to view the profile that was sent from the dashboard user.Under which a button needs to be placed: Contact User+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++DEUTSCH / GERMAN:Erstellt werden soll:Eine einzelne Startseite (PHP, Ruby, Bootstrap) mit Zugang zu einem Dashboard per Login inkl. SSL Verschlüsselung.In diesem Dashboard kann NUR ein Administrator mehrere Benutzer mit eigenen Zugang einrichten (Keine eigene Registrierung der Benutzer möglich).Diese Benutzer können verschiedene, nicht öffentliche, Profile (Eine Art Kartei) von Personen mit folgenden Daten anlegen:1. Profilbilder2. Name3. Alias-Namen4. Wohnort5. Geburtsdatum6. Geburtsort7. Haarfarbe8. Augenfarbe9. Größe10. Gewicht11. Körperstatur12. Hautfarbe13. Geschlecht14. Nationalität15. Beruf16. Tattoos und andere Köpermerkmale17. Textfeld: 2500 ZeichenDer Benutzer kann nach erfolgreichem Anlegen des Profils eine E-Mail und eine Pushmitteilung an APP-Benutzer senden. (Landesweit, oder nur in bestimmten Regionen des Landes)Bei Bedarf kann dieses Profil auf Facebook, Twitter und Co. geteilt werden.APP:Zu diesem Dashboard soll eine App programmiert werden (mit API Anbindung)In dieser App können sich normale User anmelden (E-Mail-, Facebook-, Google-, Twitter-Login).Anmeldedaten sollen nur Name und E-Mailadresse enthalten. Weiterhin sollte die Zustimmung zum Erhalt von Pushnachrichten erfolgen.Nach Erhalt der Pushmitteilung, oder der E-Mail, sollen Benutzer sich das ihnen, durch den Dashboard-Benutzer, gesendete Profil ansehen können.Darunter ein Button: Benutzer kontaktieren.
title: Small Website with secure Dashboard + App with API Connct to Dashboard
